title: Client made me make a new summoner name and screwed me!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: So can anyone help me out? Went to log in and I had to make a new summoner name now ALLLL of my stuff is gone. All the money and time I have put in this account and now it's just gone, like that.{{item:3070}} Tell me should I just uninstall and move on or is there still hope for me?

replies.body: I met this problem too. I  try to put a new summoner name , and my IP , RP, CHAMPIONS...ALL is gone..
Maybe your name was reported as inappropriate and needed to be changed?
Yeah i put in a help ticket. Still waiting on a reply to my last replay. I hope someone has an solution.

We don't reset accounts under any circumstance, so you likely logged into another account you have. I recommend using our [**username recovery tool**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/forgot-username) to ensure you're logging in with the right username.

Let me know if this worked!
